message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position. While $13,000 is closer to my minimum, I can only go down to $13,500. If you're serious about buying, this is my final offer.
